top_categories.workout_context: Spotted Horse Ultra’s 150-mile distance demands power production deep into fatigue — the defining challenge of ultra-distance gravel.
Spotted Horse Ultra rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Spotted Horse Ultra when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Spotted Horse Ultra. Make this intensity feel like home.
Spotted Horse Ultra’s iowa prairie, ultra-endurance demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Spotted Horse Ultra isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
At 150 miles, Spotted Horse Ultra rewards a massive aerobic engine. This volume work builds the fat-oxidation capacity that keeps you moving when glycogen runs low.
Every session at Spotted Horse Ultra intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
Blended sessions combine endurance with intensity spikes — exactly what Spotted Horse Ultra’s iowa prairie gravel delivers on race day.
Spotted Horse Ultra’s 8,000ft of climbing demands seated and standing versatility — the ability to change climbing style as gradient and fatigue dictate.
Spotted Horse Ultra’s iowa prairie gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Tempo is the race-day intensity of Spotted Horse Ultra. Harder than Z2, easier than threshold — the pace you’ll hold for hours on iowa prairie gravel.

race_overlay.nutrition: Ultra-distance fueling for 150 miles: 80–100g carbs/hour from mile 1 — don’t wait until you’re hungry. Practice your exact race-day nutrition in every long training ride. Carry backup calories. 150 miles burns 8,000–12,000+ calories — you cannot replace them all, but you must try.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Spotted Horse Ultra requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on iowa prairie gravel to build confidence. Expect: iowa prairie, ultra-endurance, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Durability, TT Threshold, and Over Under to prepare you for 150 miles of iowa prairie gravel in Iowa.
